casebody.data:
PINE
v.
WAL-MART ASSOCIATES, INC. # 1552, et al. 335A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2017 Holly M. Stott, Attorney at Law, M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Linda Stephens, Attorney at Law, for Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. # 1552, et al. David A. Shelby, Attorney at Law, Salisbury, for Pine, Patricia.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of November 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of December 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 16th day of January 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
